attributes.action: Educate accountants that engineers are not people who walk around with a hammer and a bag of nails hanging from their belt.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Engineers, at whatever level, are always treated as a "necessary evil" in most companies, and the accountants in those companies would get rid of engineering staff if they could.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
